services.name: Estate Planning
services.description: Estate planning involves creating a strategy for handling your financial affairs and healthcare choices, both now and in the future.

services.name: Elder Law
services.description: Elder law encompasses the laws and regulations that impact aging individuals and help guide families through related legal matters.

services.name: Probate and Estate Administration
services.description: I help navigate the legal procedures involved in settling and transferring ownership of a deceased person's property.
